news_header: Nokia reports a decline in net sales and operating profits for Q3, but maintains its 2024 outlook.
news_text: In the July-September period, Nokia's comparable operating profits decreased by 9% to EUR 454 million, while net sales fell by 8% year-on-year to EUR 4.3 billion. CEO Pekka Lundmark expressed satisfaction with the company's progress in the third quarter despite ongoing challenges in some business areas. Nokia's outlook for 2024 remains unchanged, with expectations for comparable operating profits between EUR 2.3 billion and EUR 2.9 billion.
